task.Question: Of the cities within the United States where U.S. presidents were born, which two are the farthest apart from the westernmost to the easternmost going east, giving the city names only? Give them to me in alphabetical order, in a comma-separated list

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Searched "cities where us presidents are born" on Google.
2. Opened "List of presidents of the United States by home state" on Wikipedia.
3. Searched the eastern cities to find the easternmost one (Braintree, MA).
4. Checked the westernmost city (Honolulu, HI).

steps.content: Of the cities within the United States where U.S. presidents were born, which two are the farthest apart from the westernmost to the easternmost going east, giving the city names only? Give them to me in alphabetical order, in a comma-separated list

plan: Identify the cities in the United States where U.S. presidents were born.
Determine the geographical coordinates (longitude) of each city.
Find the westernmost and easternmost cities based on their longitudes.
Select the two cities that are farthest apart from each other, one being the westernmost and the other the easternmost.
Sort the names of these two cities alphabetically.
Format the final answer as a comma-separated list.

facts_to_lookup: List of U.S. cities where U.S. presidents were born
facts_to_derive: Westernmost city among the birthplaces of U.S. presidents
Easternmost city among the birthplaces of U.S. presidents
Distance between the westernmost and easternmost cities

steps.text:
Title: Birthplaces of U.S. Presidents by state
=======================
[![Presidents of the United States website](img/presidentsusa.jpg "PresidentsUSA.net")](http://www.presidentsusa.net)
[![Presidents of the United States website](img/logo.png "PresidentsUSA.net")](http://www.presidentsusa.net)

U.S. Presidents Birthplaces by State
====================================

#### Virginia (8\)

* [George Washington](http://www.presidentsusa.net/washingtonbirthplace.html "George Washington birthplace photographs")
* [Thomas Jefferson](http://www.presidentsusa.net/jeffersonbirthplace.html "Thomas Jefferson birthplace photographs")
* [James Madison](http://www.presidentsusa.net/madisonbirthplace.html "James Madison birthplace photographs")
* [James Monroe](http://www.presidentsusa.net/monroebirthplace.html "James Monroe birthplace photographs")
* [William Henry Harrison](http://www.presidentsusa.net/whharrisonbirthplace.html "William Henry Harrison birthplace photographs")
* [John Tyler](http://www.presidentsusa.net/tylerbirthplace.html "John Tyler birthplace photographs")
* [Zachary Taylor](http://www.presidentsusa.net/taylorbirthplace.html "Zachary Taylor birthplace photographs")
* [Woodrow Wilson](http://www.presidentsusa.net/wilsonbirthplace.html "Woodrow Wilson birthplace photographs")

#### Pennsylvania (2\)

* [James Buchanan](http://www.presidentsusa.net/buchananbirthplace.html "James Buchanan birthplace photographs")
* [Joe Biden](http://www.presidentsusa.net/bidenbirthplace.html "Joe Biden birthplace photographs")

#### Arkansas

* [Bill Clinton](http://www.presidentsusa.net/clintonbirthplace.html "Bill Clinton birthplace photographs")

#### New Jersey

* [Grover Cleveland](http://www.presidentsusa.net/clevelandbirthplace.html "Grover Cleveland birthplace photographs")

#### Illinois

* [Ronald Reagan](http://www.presidentsusa.net/reaganbirthplace.html "Ronald Reagan birthplace photographs")

#### Ohio (7\)

* [Ulysses S. Grant](http://www.presidentsusa.net/grantbirthplace.html "Ulysses S. Grant birthplace photographs")
* [Rutherford B. Hayes](http://www.presidentsusa.net/hayesbirthplace.html "Rutherford B. Hayes birthplace photographs")
* [James Garfield](http://www.presidentsusa.net/garfieldbirthplace.html "James Garfield birthplace photographs")
* [Benjamin Harrison](http://www.presidentsusa.net/bharrisonbirthplace.html "Benjamin Harrison birthplace photographs")
* [William McKinley](http://www.presidentsusa.net/mckinleybirthplace.html "William McKinley birthplace photographs")
* [William Howard Taft](http://www.presidentsusa.net/taftbirthplace.html "William Howard Taft birthplace photographs")
* [Warren Harding](http://www.presidentsusa.net/hardingbirthplace.html "Warren Harding birthplace photographs")

#### Vermont (2\)

* [Chester Arthur](http://www.presidentsusa.net/arthurbirthplace.html "Chester Arthur birthplace photographs")
* [Calvin Coolidge](http://www.presidentsusa.net/coolidgebirthplace.html "Calvin Coolidge birthplace photographs")

#### Connecticut

* [George W. Bush](http://www.presidentsusa.net/gwbushbirthplace.html "George W. Bush birthplace photographs")

#### California

* [Richard Nixon](http://www.presidentsusa.net/nixonbirthplace.html "Richard Nixon birthplace photographs")

#### Hawaii

* [Barack Obama](http://www.presidentsusa.net/obamabirthplace.html "Barack Obama birthplace photographs")

#### New York (5\)

* [Martin Van Buren](http://www.presidentsusa.net/vanburenbirthplace.html "Martin Van Buren birthplace photographs")
* [Millard Fillmore](http://www.presidentsusa.net/fillmorebirthplace.html "Millard Fillmore birthplace photographs")
* [Theodore Roosevelt](http://www.presidentsusa.net/trooseveltbirthplace.html "Theodore Roosevelt birthplace photographs")
* [Franklin D. Roosevelt](http://www.presidentsusa.net/fdrbirthplace.html "Franklin D. Roosevelt birthplace photographs")
* [Donald Trump](http://www.presidentsusa.net/trumpbirthplace.html "Donald Trump birthplace photographs")

#### Texas (2\)

* [Dwight Eisenhower](http://www.presidentsusa.net/eisenhowerbirthplace.html "Dwight Eisenhower birthplace photographs")
* [Lyndon Johnson](http://www.presidentsusa.net/ljohnsonbirthplace.html "Lyndon Johnson birthplace photographs")

#### Iowa

* [Herbert Hoover](http://www.presidentsusa.net/hooverbirthplace.html "Herbert Hoover birthplace photographs")

#### Nebraska

* [Gerald Ford](http://www.presidentsusa.net/fordbirthsite.html "Gerald Ford birthplace photographs")

#### Kentucky

* [Abraham Lincoln](http://www.presidentsusa.net/lincolnbirthplace.html "Abraham Lincoln birthplace photographs")

#### New Hampshire

* [Franklin Pierce](http://www.presidentsusa.net/piercebirthplace.html "Franklin Pierce birthplace photographs")

#### Massachusetts (4\)

* [John Adams](http://www.presidentsusa.net/jadamsbirthplace.html "John Adams birthplace photographs")
* [John Quincy Adams](http://www.presidentsusa.net/jqadamsbirthplace.html "John Quincy Adams birthplace photographs")
* [John F. Kennedy](http://www.presidentsusa.net/jfkbirthplace.html "John F. Kennedy birthplace photographs")
* [George Bush](http://www.presidentsusa.net/ghwbushbirthplace.html "George Bush birthplace photographs")

#### Missouri

* [Harry Truman](http://www.presidentsusa.net/trumanbirthsite.html "Harry Truman birthplace photographs")

#### Georgia

* [Jimmy Carter](http://www.presidentsusa.net/carterbirthplace.html "Jimmy Carter birthplace photographs")

#### North Carolina (3\*)

* [Andrew Jackson](http://www.presidentsusa.net/jacksonbirthplace.html "Andrew Jackson birthplace photographs")
* [James K. Polk](http://www.presidentsusa.net/polkbirthplace.html "James K. Polk birthplace photographs")
* [Andrew Johnson](http://www.presidentsusa.net/ajohnsonbirthplace.html "Andrew Johnson birthplace photographs")

#### South Carolina\*

* [Andrew Jackson](http://www.presidentsusa.net/jacksonbirthplace.html "Andrew Jackson birthplace photographs")

* *\*Andrew Jackson is shown under North Carolina and South Carolina because his precise birth location along the border of those states in unknown.*

The purpose of this site is to provide researchers, students, teachers, politicians, journalists,
 and citizens a complete resource guide to the US Presidents. You may link to this or any other page on PresidentsUSA.net.

steps.reasoning: The cities where U.S. presidents were born include: Westmoreland County, Virginia; Braintree, Massachusetts; Shadwell, Virginia; North Bend, Ohio; Caldwell, New Jersey; and others. The westernmost city is likely Westmoreland County, Virginia, and the easternmost is likely Caldwell, New Jersey. The two cities are Westmoreland County and Caldwell. Alphabetically, they are: Caldwell, Westmoreland.

steps.overview: Identified the two farthest cities where U.S. presidents were born and sorted them alphabetically.
